mapper.update: UPDATE inventory a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.sku_id,SUM(t.trans_inv) s_trans_inv,SUM(t.locked_inv) s_locked_inv,SUM(t.inventory) s_inventory FROM inventory_area t GROUP BY t.sku_id) b ON a.`sku_id`=b.sku_id SET a.`inventory`=b.s_inventory,a.`trans_inv`=b.s_trans_inv,a.`locked_inv`=b.s_locked_inv
